long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A handy extension to copy the password on webpage to clipboard.

You will no longer have to inspect the page and change the input type of password field to see the password.

Just install it and click the extension icon when you need to copy the characters behind those *** .

Have fun.
